name: ShepHARD
description:
WORKS BEST IN CHROME.

A game for the GMTK GameJam 2020.

Call commands to your trusty sheep dog to have her herd sheep safely.  Herd sheep from one paddock to another!

Controls: WASD to control ShepHARD. Arrow Keys to command your dog. Mouse to look around.

Programming & design by:
Matt at Matte Dev (@mattjhayter)
Paul at Paul Makes Games (@paulmakesgames)

Programming, design & artwork by Karle Kane

Music and SFX by https://www.mikeyparsons.com/

Bass guitar and electric guitar by Stanley Macdonald
